title: Holy obseruations. Lib. 1. Also some fewe of Dauids Psalmes metaphrased, for a taste of the rest. By Ios. Hall
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Samuel Macham: and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Bull-head,
